name: Drowning in debts
description:
Diving can be a very expensive but also very profitable. Every second spent underwater costs you money, but there is hidden treasure in the ocean, worth the trouble. Catch fish, save up for upgrades and dive deeper. Goal is to become rich!

Keyboard
  • WASD/Arrow keys - Movement
  • F - Dive/Surface
  •  SPACE/SHIFT - Dash (when unlocked)
 Controller
  •  Left Stick - Movement
  • Y - Dive/Surface
  • A - Dash (when unlocked)

As you plunge deeper into debt, you need to dive deeper into the ocean.
